title: animind.study: Learning Made Visual (developed in 36 hours at LAHacks)
description: Animind generates Manim-based educational animations that help explain concepts visually. Topics, ideas, entire lessonsâ€”brought to life with beautiful animations.

title: Voxed: AI Powered Learning Assistant
description: This app allows users to create a structured db and chat interface to help them learn and interact with their own data. Originally built for students to store lecture videos and class docs and interact with them via llm.

title: IlliniPlan: AI Powered Class Planner
description: IlliniPlan helps students plan courses, track graduation progress, and meet academic requirements with a smart, rule-based scheduler. Offering personalized course recommendations, resolves unmet requirements, prevents invalid plans, and integrates institutional data with insights like average GPA. Schedules can be exported and shared with advisors.

title: NVRALONE
description: Mental health awareness brand. Previously $10k/month revenue. Raised thousands for suicide awareness

title: IlliniSpots: The Instagram of study spots at UIUC
description: Shows all buildings on campus with room availability. Users can favorite buildings and comment.
